website_summaries.verdict: More than two years after its debut, the smarter-than-ever Amazon Echo remains one of the best connected home products money can currently buy.
pros: Amazon's voice-activated smart home speaker is undeniably futuristic, but it's also practical and accessible
With a rapidly growing slate of features, integrations and use cases, it's easy to get excited about the Echo's potential
cons: The Echo's sound quality is slightly uneven at times, with weak bass at high volumes
It also can't distinguish between different voices like the Google Home smart speaker can

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have worked longer than year
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 1 year now will not do anything will not even respond... very disappointed. Was happy when it did worked we showed all of our friends what a great item it was but now it won't even set an alarm for us. Have tried reseting I and still no results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Then I was able to connect easily as it should be
customer_reviews.text: Once it was properly configured it worked perfectly, but the configuration was the problem. I am fairly technical and completely understood the instructions and followed them explicitely but the app would not offer me the option of configuring my WiFi network. After considerable research on the internet I finally asked " issues with attaching echo to an AT&T u-verse network. That was where I found the answer to my problem. Had to go my Android phone settings, Wi-Fi and turn of "Smart Switch Network". Then I was able to connect easily as it should be. I did not find this information anywhere on the Amazon web site about assistance with connecting to WiFi, it was a blog site. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: cdub

customer_reviews.title: Not all that useful
customer_reviews.text: I don't think we get the most out of it our echo. The echo basically sits there and gets little use other than when anything on T.V. says Alexa. Some of the things I would like it to do require another piece which is really expensive. The lights, thermostat, and locking devices are all priced too high. So, its a speaker that answers questions but my Receiver works better for music and we have tablets... So, it sits and waits for me to tell it to sing to me.
customer_reviews.author: jaychalm

customer_reviews.title: Echo stopped working about a month ago. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Echo stopped working about a month ago. I have contacted Amazon over this issue and have not received a reply. After reading the reviews I see there are many people having trouble with the power cord. I tried unplugging the Echo for 15 seconds, held the reset button on the bottom for 15 seconds yet nothing works. Seems there is a problem with the power cord. Why is it so hard to communicate with Amazon through their website? they keep the "contact us" link hidden from the public. I have looked everywhere and see nothing for live support or a phone number. WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A Kuchar

customer_reviews.title: do better. If it worked fine one day there is ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked for one day and then it didn't work at all. It's a WiFi issue, with a very complicated fix. A fix that I just don't have time to muddle through. It's just supposed to work. They want me to split my WiFi blah blah blah, come on Amazon, do better. If it worked fine one day there is no reason it shouldn't have worked after that, so now it just sits on my desk. I wanted to like it, and I did, or one day.
customer_reviews.author: Olson

customer_reviews.title: Only worked properly for one day
customer_reviews.text: I loved my new Echo for the one day that it worked! Since the day after Christmas it kept needing to be re-setup everytime I used it, until today when it stopped working all together! After spending over an hour on the phone with Amazon Echo customer service they decided that the microphone was faulty and had stopped working. They are sending me a new one but not until Jan 30th!!! That means I have to wait 25 days for the replacement. I am amazed that Amazon did not stock some for replacements when there is bound to be some number of defective units. I consider that to be a poor customer service decision.
customer_reviews.author: P. McEwen

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with my Alexa until she suddenly started communicating erratically and not connecting to the internet. Not a connection problem in my home. All other electronics are connected to the internet with no problems. I tried resetting and unplugging but would still have the same problem. I purchased her 5/13/2017 today is 6/8/2017, not even a month, and i'm putting in a request for an exchange. Will see how the replacement holds up.
customer_reviews.author: teddyb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product, even better with a skin on it !!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, this thing is amazing !! We use it everyday for the weather and music. Having it tell us jokes is fun for the family. Ask Alexa to self destruct, lol. Shopping list is also another feature that we use. Also, check out these cool skins, super easy to apply and look great !
customer_reviews.author: Doug Rock

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I live in Jamaica and wanted to be able to enjoy the Amazon Echo experience. I actually ordered one only find out that this device does not work in my country. As a loyal and frequent customer of Amazon I was extremely disappointed that you don't seem to value your customers outside of the US. I'm so very disappointed. Now I'll have to wait and see what Google Home does for it's overseas customers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No issues with device or setup
customer_reviews.text: Bought the refurbished Echo due to the reasonable price compared to new, no issues with the Echo setup is simple and was up and running in ten minutes. Sound quality is actually really good and voice recognition works well. I liked the Echo so much I bought dots for every room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Just spent an hour + trying to get it ip ...
customer_reviews.text: Just spent an hour + trying to get it ip and running. Tried to download app with 2 different Fires. No luck. Also took me half an hour to get it out of the box. Whoever packed it is a moron, as am I for buying it. I suspect the idea is you can't return what you can't repack.. If you are 23 with endless time on your hands, go for it. I was a very loyal customer of Amazon. I have had it. Smarten up Jeff.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Gleeson

customer_reviews.title: A Great Companion!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few months now and I love it! I can talk to it from the top of the stairs and it will turn on lights. The integration with WInk is awesome, and honesty seems to be faster than turning lights on with the Wink app. I can't wait to see what other integrations are coming!
customer_reviews.author: Living in Glitter

customer_reviews.title: Echo has a long way to go . . .
customer_reviews.text: This product has a long way to go when it comes to pulling information from the Internet. Also, while I can start a shopping list, I can't delete an item without going through the app; and it can only maintain one shopping list and one things to do list so my husband can't have his own. The few things it does well include weather, time, some streaming music, alarms. I also have Google Home which has it's problems, yet is slightly ahead of this Echo. I started with the Tap and sent it back thinking this one would be better, yet not much. When it works, it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect this to work like it does in the ads
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointing. Only thing we can somewhat reliably get it to do is play music. Even the weather is from a different town. If you're expecting this device to perform like Siri, you'll be disappointed. I clearly didn't do my research. I saw all the five star reviews and got the wrong impression of how this would work. Most often Alexa tells us she doesn't understand the question and refers us to an app. She doesn't work with any of my podcasts. My kids complain that she works great in the commercials.
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part about her is our rich conversation
customer_reviews.text: My hands are finally getting the rest they deserve. If I want to know something Alexa tells me, if I need to make a list she's got my back. My favorite part about her is our rich conversation. It's mostly me pooring my heart out and getting dry emotionless responses from Alexa. She just gets me so well. Whatever I tell her to do she does. Unless she can't. Then I get mad and we fight. To calm me down she plays me my favorite song, I forgive her and we laugh and sing and dance once more. Who knew I could find my soul mate on Amazon. Guess I can delete Tinder now.
customer_reviews.author: Jayden F.

customer_reviews.title: iHeart Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Bought this quite a while back. Alexa has become a part of the family. She plays my music locally or on other Echoes or speakers, gives me news I'm interested in, answers my questions, helps control my smart home, alarms based on regular presets and one off alarms and alerts, helps me manage my calendar, allows me to order and request stuff, and provides area advisory alerts. She has so many optional skills it'll make your head spin and she's constantly getting smarter. Maybe too smart. Hmmm.
customer_reviews.author: flowynn

customer_reviews.title: Great item,  I don't know how I did without it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!!! I have been able to link my Google Calendar to it to ask Alexa to add events to it. She will prompt you to fill in the day and time and name of the event. I have added skills to play games, get weather, play sounds (rain, thunderstorm, white noise). I have linked it to my Pandora account and can tell "her" to play a certain type station I have set up in my Pandora account and she will play it!!! Every day she "boggles" my mind as to what she can and will do. She will only get better!!! She has great sound, especially noticeable when playing music!!!! I highly recommend getting an Echo.
customer_reviews.author: DAC1965

customer_reviews.title: This product works pretty good. Sometimes it's a little frustrating when it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works pretty good. Sometimes it's a little frustrating when it doesn't understand what you are saying when you are clearly saying it. Being disabled and living alone it helps me from having to get up and down up and down. I can ask it if I have an appointment tomorrow and that will tell me where and what time. I can ask it about a business it will usually give me the hours of operation and telephone number. But they need to work harder on local businesses. Overall it really has been a big help in my household.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Turpel

customer_reviews.title: Friggin Beast Mode Alexa
customer_reviews.text: W.T. F. This thing is a BEAST. If you even understood the magical properties of this thing, you would be amazed. First of all, I really only use this thing for music. We have it outside by our pool. And I seriously mean outside. Did Amazon know that people are stupid and leave electronics outside in rain? Probably not. I don't think they made this thing waterproof, but this glorious thing has survived torrential downpours, being blown off our deck, hail, and other various disasters and has survived. It sits out in 100 degree weather all day, gets rained on when we forget it, and survives...if this thing doesn't deserve a five star review, idk what does.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: has some limits
customer_reviews.text: I love Alexa very much for music and a few games. I have tried to ask her trivia questions but she usually doesn;'t have an answer I thought she'd be smarter like Cortana. I asked Alexa what was Ullyses Grant's first name was and she said Ullyses NOT!!!!!! It was Hiram? I have had a great time listening to Alexa and I got her as a gift so I am happy with her, I also would like to be able to use the app from my computer not just my phone which could break down and then I am not able to change items in Alexa. That is a drawback because I use my computer much more than my phone.
customer_reviews.author: s.pauley

customer_reviews.title: Serious Fun and the Beginning of my connected home!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this! Got it today and had some issue hooking it up to my laptop so called Amazon Customer Service and they were super helpful. It seems I have some privacy settings which wouldn't allow the set up so did it with my Kindle....and within 3 minutes I was flipping from artist to artist for music....asking Alexa to raise the volume or lower it. Awesome! Just for the music it is worth it (I bought it when it went down to 149 on Veterans Day)...you can be in another room and Alexa will hear you. I can't wait to find out everything this device can do...but in my first hour....I am really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: thebgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a week now. The family really enjoying the Amazon music service. All types of genres at the command of your voice. I've installed 2 Tp-link smart switches. Easy to use and integrate with Alexa. I'm able to control my outside lighting for my home. You can also set up a schedule for the lights. Also if you're away from your home you can turn on/off the lights with your smartphone. The possibilities are endless. I'm still exploring other skills. I was fortunate to get it on sale during the one year anniversary. I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Got 5 years of service e out of her.
customer_reviews.text: Well, we got 5 years out of this device. Almost to the day. Received 5/4/15. Died 5/15/20. Tried a replacement 21W power adapter. No dice... replacement power board is non existent. So have to buy a new gen 3 I guess. Wish it lasted longer. Cant complain though, we got in on the original pre-release for $99 deal. Have to figure out a good send off. I'm thinking a viking funeral with a floating raft, gasoline, and arrows.
customer_reviews.author: FrEaK_aCcIdEnT

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased after a longtime researching.
customer_reviews.text: I've been sitting on the sidelines for over a year reading the reviews carefully. I've got to say, I'm not disappointed I finally bought this little lady. She understands everything I say, very reliable, great sound, and just looks SO cool with her colorful spinning top of colors. This is just like the movie "Her". I wake up and ask her "what time it is" without reaching for my phone, ask her about the weather, my commute time, and then the news of the day all before I say "Alexa, lights on" and the then she turns on all my living room lights (with the Wemo I also bought). Having SO much fun with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Hickorybro

customer_reviews.title: I like getting my morning Flash Briefings before I even open ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Echo and the Dot since February. I like getting my morning Flash Briefings before I even open up my eyes in the morning. The New York Times "Daily" is great to listen too in that briefing. I also use it throughout the day to stream my favorite radio station in another country using TuneIn and my favorite tunes using Spotify. Once we take possession of our older oceanfront home in July I hope to have my Wemo switches and receptacles set up by August. I also will be installing an August lock on the main door along with an alarm system that can all be operated by voice with the Echo or the Dot.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Echo is a MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: This device is an excellent edition to any gadget geeks collection. The build of the product is great-- everything from the internal speaker when playing music to Alexa's voice recognition technology. You will spend hours tinkering with Echo's features, believe me. For those who are still caught between choosing the Amazon Echo or Google Home-- the Echo wins the battle by a landslide. Google Home's voice recognition tech is good, but Alexa's replies and background information on specific subjects in comparison to the Google Home really show the effort Amazon put in when creating the Echo. Lastly, and possibly the deal breaker; Echo is blue-tooth compatible, Google Home is not.
customer_reviews.author: Steelo

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without Echo anymore
customer_reviews.text: When my husband first told me about the Echo, I thought it seemed silly, but now I can't imagine my life without Alexa. She helps me find my phone when I've lost it, keep multiple timers going while cooking dinner, entertains me by playing music from Pandora or Amazon Prime, turn on and off my lights so I don't have to struggle with my full hands to find the switch, and gives me the weather update. We love her so much that we got a 2nd one for our 2nd floor, and bought 3 more for our parents as Christmas Gifts. If you love being hands free, you're going to love the Amazon Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L

customer_reviews.title: I love the Echo
customer_reviews.text: I love the Echo. "Alexa" (the wake up name) has been doing a good job. I've been using the weather forecast, playing my Amazon songs (the speakers are excellent quality), having Alexa tell me the latest headline news, tell me "yo mama" jokes, keep track of my to do list and shopping list. It really is like having a personal assistant. Be sure to get the most out of her by downloading the Alexa app to your cell, desktop or tablet so that you can add a ton of "skills" to it. You also do the voice tutorials with the app. I also bought a skin for it so it won't get scratches.
customer_reviews.author: *Rock Star*Top Contributor: Painting

customer_reviews.title: Thought this would be kinda cool. Boy was I wrong
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be kinda cool. Boy was I wrong! It's SUPER COOL. Kicks Siri's a$# and I'm a hardcore apple patron. This thing does literally anything you can think of. She understands every voice in the house and she's fast. She gets me phone numbers, checks the traffic on my commute route, plays all kinds of cool games, checks the weather, plays music, makes purchases. You name she does it. Heck you'll never pick up your phone again when your home. Love love love it. Need one for every room in the house. Please Amazon, don't quit updating and supporting Alexa! And advertise it more! If people try it, I know they'll love it. WORTH EVERY PENNY!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hagedorn

customer_reviews.title: No powercord or remote
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited when my echo was delivered. I unboxed and unwrapped it only to find that the power adapter is not included. Selling a product like this without the means to get power to it goes against industry standard. I may have missed it, but I couldn't find where this was stated in the product description either-- I shouldn't have had to look anyways because this is an electronic device that has to be plugged in to work. Considering Amazon will gladly sell you the powercord for 20 more dollars, it's quite slimy. I guess Amazon wins this round. ...Oh, it doesn't have her remote either.
customer_reviews.author: Z.S. Ivie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my Alexa. I'm a avid music listener. It is so convenient. I also use it to turn lights on and off. My African Grey parrot this am said "Alexa", "I Love You, Alexa responded "It's nice to be appreciated". I'm not they only one 😊.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Died after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: I have had an Alexa since Christmas of 2015. Last night it just stopped connecting to WiFi. Today I tried the set up, and after a few minutes I picked it up to reset it, but it never came back on. The warranty is just for one year, so it is effectively a paper weight after 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jericho

customer_reviews.title: Really very nifty!
customer_reviews.text: When I tell Alexa she's better than Siri, she humbly replies "not better, just different." I beg to differ. I have a failure to communicate with Siri more than half the time I try. Alexa works pretty well. Certainly not 100% but better than any conversational interface/voice recognition I've ever used. The speakers don't sound bad either. Unfortunately even though I love blasting music on a good system, I don't have one, and the Echo is a pretty good substitute. I'm thinking about getting another (or one of its smaller cousins) to put in the kitchen for listening to podcasts while cooking (and telling Alexa to set a timer instead of having to use messy hands).
customer_reviews.author: Glen Ford

customer_reviews.title: She feels like a real person and has so many capabilities that ...
customer_reviews.text: Long time Echo owner and I still feel strongly enough about Alexa to write a positive review and it's been at least a year and a half. She's become a fixture in my home and I use her everyday for music, timers, weather, news, and other random stuff. She feels like a real person and has so many capabilities that each owner can use her to their liking. I can see Amazon's commitment to upgrading the Echo and staying on the cutting edge of connectivity and artificial intelligence over the time I've owned it. I fully recommend the Echo (Alexa) to anyone and everyone. Amazon did a great job with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Moersfelder

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING SINCE THE COMPUTER. ALREADY BOUGHT A SECOND ONE.
customer_reviews.text: I love you Siri, but Alexa understands me much better. She's got really good ears. She can take orders from half-way across my house. She is very useful. Mine is in the family room, within shouting distance of the kitchen. Alexa can be your cooking timer. She can convert teaspoons to cups, metric to U.S., and explain what "TREACLE" is. I tell her to add things to my shopping list as soon as I notice (& before I forget). She can do a web search and usually TELL you the answer. She can add to my to-do list and can still turn off the lights for me. I bought a second Echo 3 weeks after I got the first one.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Indespensible
customer_reviews.text: Working from home, this has become an indispensable part of my life and I am only scratching the surface of all that ECHO can do. The sound of the music is excellent and being able to access the Amazon library for music leaves me unlimited choices. I also like to play the NPR news along with weather. As time goes on, I am sure that I will find many other uses for this device. It is hard to believe that this sounds as good as my old 1970s stereo used to. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anarchy_Now

customer_reviews.title: Nuisance
customer_reviews.text: The product stopped working after the second day. It no longer produced any sound whatsoever. I sent it back for a refund, so that I may get another current one, but it’s still pending... a month later and the return period has closed. Update: They just realized they have the Echo. Account just updated that they have processed the return but it still may take 3-6 days to process it and another 3-6 to get it to the bank. Come on, Amazon... this is the first and only return I’ve ever sent back... and out of all the money I spend with you, I expect the turn around to be faster than 2-3 months...
customer_reviews.author: Dancer '73

customer_reviews.title: I totally dig this as one of my favorite toys. If youre considering it
customer_reviews.text: I totally dig this as one of my favorite toys. If youre considering it, get it. Dont bother with the one where you have to press the button. I find myself saying thank you to this thing whenever it answers a question. It gets updated with new things you can ask it. You can play games with it and have a semi conversation...kinda. Id like to know when they will update with a pirate voice. I am also glad no one in my house is named Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: dennismichael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is something that I always thought seemed like a stupid idea... ending catching a sale on a refurbished one and decided to try it out to see what all the fuss was about. All I can say is... this is one piece of technology that I could not live without in my kitchen... from music to asking for recipes... to entertaining the kids with jokes and games before school... this little speaker doe it all. Alexa is actually helpful and likeable... unlike my experiences with Siri.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Defective and had to return
customer_reviews.text: I am fully aware that sometimes products, especially complex devices can be defective. It worked well for about a day and then the wifi stopped connecting. Tried all the suggested fixes and then called customer support. Got someone very quickly and they also determined to be defective and sending me a new one. That being said I am confident that the new one will work as it's supposed to. And the day I had it working I was very impressed. This device is for real. The sound quality is impressive and the voice control works much better that I thought. So when I get my new one I hope to revise my review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: NJAY

customer_reviews.title: So useful
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, works great, sounds great. I love this thing so much. We've had it for around 5 months and it gets used daily. We use the reminders all the time for things like run dishwasher in 2 hours, stuff like that. It makes a great speaker for music, and I've listened to audiobooks as well. I do wish there were more "skills" but I suppose those will come in time. There is a Jeopardy game and that's a lot of fun. Also, we've been using it as a white noise machine lately because of neighbors barking dogs and it works great for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Echo device needs to be reset every several days
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Echo device in the Spring of 2017 after great experiences with our other Echo devices and love of the Amazon platform. This device was a little buggy, so we put it in a room we don't typically use. About six months ago we moved it to our kitchen. Unfortunately, every few days it needs to be reset, which severely limits its functionality. We are looking for a new voice assistant now and are reluctant to try an Echo again because we are past the customer support window. It is clearly a defective device and it is unfortunate that there's no longer support for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an early Christmas present for my mother. She's in her 50's and has intermediate computer skills, so I help her with some things but she's mostly technically self-sufficient. Neither of us have a need to wait until Christmas day to give our gifts for the year so I bought this on this past Cyber Monday and gave it to her about a week or so later. She told me that she had this thing setup by herself in no time at all. My mom is RAVING about this thing. She's always telling me about all these things it can do and how much she loves it. It's probably the best gift I've ever given her.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ware

customer_reviews.title: So I have 3 Echos and we love them all
customer_reviews.text: I recently made a trip to the UK with my wife to visit friends.... One of my Brit friends introduced me to Alexa. I was blown away by her skills. The day we got home I bought one. My wife-who is NOT an early adopter of techie things demanded we buy another for our bedroom upstairs and a week later she requested another for the den. So I have 3 Echos and we love them all. For the price of Amazon music unlimited.... you can hear just about ANY genre/album/ or song you can think of.... the sound quality is excellent and the device is getting new skills everyday! 5 stars aren't enough.... this is my favorite electronic device ever!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve ByTheBay

customer_reviews.title: Best personal assistant
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for us and I didn't know what it was. Six months later and I would hate to live without it lol. Turns on our apartment lights when we enter, and off when going to bed, tells me the weather and news daily, and plays the music I want when I want at the volume I want. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TRH

customer_reviews.title: Wifi died, useless, to trash it went. BMW, big mone vwasted
customer_reviews.text: Hardly used, mostly to play Tunein radio. Suddenly it cannot connect to wifi anymore. Tried everything, including deregistration, factory reset, 3 different phones, etc. Just threw it in garbage. After the Amazon fire phone fiasco (useless phone now, Amazon didn't even provide an update in years. Why didn't Amazon, at the very least, give the customers the option and software to switch to Android? ), a couple of older fire tvs which are so slow now they are practically unusable, I am very skeptical about buying anymore Amazon hardware in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amadeus

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love Echo
customer_reviews.text: Not as many options as I imagined there would be. More "skills" require apps that I have to memorize the name of the app first, then ask the question. For example, I can't just ask "TV listings tonight for CBS". There's some skill I needed to load and then I have to say the name of it (something like "Ask TV") first, and then the question. Too many questions that I consider simple are met with "I didn't understand the question". Another example - "Alexa, how far is it to the Marriott in Syracuse, NY from here?" was met with the "I don't understand the question" no matter how I phrased it. Hopefully, it will get better.
customer_reviews.author: David Scott

customer_reviews.title: ... writing an Echo 2nd Gen review even though i love the device
customer_reviews.text: Apparently Amazon has prevented me from writing an Echo 2nd Gen review even though i love the device. So, The best thing is its crystal clear audio -- hard to find in a speaker os this price. Second is its connectivity -- Amazon has done a great job in encouraging developers to write skills. I could go on, but what i love best is the new multi-room audion which, in effect, creates a sonoros experience with a fantastic, linked multi-room experience. Just imagine the ability to walk through your Alexa enabled spaces and hearing the same experience at the same quality. There is nothing like it. You can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen WH

customer_reviews.title: Fun on the countertop!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Echo. I use it practically every day. I use it for raising the temperature in my house up and down, locking my front door, reading my online book to me while I cook, listening to my Pandora music while I cook and clean, and keeping up with my shopping list. She's also just plain fun. She tells us jokes, and we ask her to do things she cannot do and laugh while she tries to find answers on Bing... I admit, I'm a bit of a nerd.
customer_reviews.author: texasgem

customer_reviews.title: Breaks right after warranty
customer_reviews.text: The device worked wonderfully brand new. Unfortunately right as the 1 year mark crept up problems arose. Initially the device just occasionally would be completely muted (only fixable after a power cycle). Then this issue became more and more frequent until the device was for the most part not usable. After many resets and conversations with customer service, they determined it could not be fixed and the solution was to buy a new one. This is a speaker (an expensive one for the sound quality) and as such should last longer than one year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: optional enhancement suggestion
customer_reviews.text: hey, if anyone actually reads these, I would like to say that I love the Echo and have connected a lot of things in my home (smart lights, iRobot, etc). I would like to make a request, if that's possible... Is it possible to make a "polite" mode which forces you to say "please" during commands. I suppose it would have to be optional, but I can pretty much say its safe to say that there are people out there who don't use "please" and "thank you" any more... This option would help kids learn manners, if nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Anything Echo does I can do from my phone
customer_reviews.text: **just read an article that says Echo records everything even when you're not talking to it!** Pretty much a paper weight. The stuff is does know I can get off my phone. Most things it can't answer.I can get weather on my phone and the latest news. This was a gift so no money lost.. just don't really see the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Aron Linville

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Works okay for telling silly jokes such as those on Bazooka Bubble Gum wrappers. Turns my kitchen lights on or off thru TP-Link smart switch. Adds items to my shopping and to-do lists. Otherwise is much less useful than Window's Cortana. Cannot identify my nearest town or tell me its name when I ask about its zip code. Cannot answer simple questions. Gives wrong phone numbers for locations much further away.It's been about 6 weeks and she has been a very slow learner. I'm still waiting. Seems promising but the nearly two year old promise of learning to do more with use is looking to be hollow. Disappointed. If Cortana has an IQ of 100, Alexa's is about 65.
customer_reviews.author: Chulo Skylark

customer_reviews.title: Our home will never be the same!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Alexa has managed to exceed all of my expectations! Not only has she answered every odd question I've asked her, but her sound quality is amazing! We tested her "skills" with our smart lights and our ecobee.. she flawlessly completed each task every time. We have played games with her (20 questions, magic door, etc) and my 6 year old is absolutely loving it. We have played music, asked about the weather, the news, our favorite sports teams, etc... and she has responded accurately each and every time. I would absolutely recommend getting an Alexa of your very own! Not only has she made our lives easier but she's also a lot of fun and quite entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Matusiak

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful surprise after we received echo
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful surprise after we received echo. The setup took less than 5 minutes and we were away and running. After such an easy installation it only got better & better. Alexa has the potential to completely transform the functioning in our home. It understands two distinct Asian accents better than cortana/ Siri or any other voice activated system that we have used. The access to music, information, entertainment is awesome and mind changing. I can't wait to connect it other devices in the home and see how everything connects together. Apple you have a challenge on your hands inside the home because echo is really a joy to have.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: I should say I loved it --then she died
customer_reviews.text: I should say I loved it --then she died. Just over a year and I feel it should have lasted longer than that. When we contacted Amazon they had no help or options because it was over a year-No we did not have an extended warranty-Just didn't think it would be necessary as we have had other Amazon products and had no issues. They did offer a small credit toward a new one but..again it only lasted a year..not sure we want another. Also have a Tap for about 6 months now and have replaced it already. Have been Prime member for years but this has left us very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Echo
customer_reviews.text: I really love my Amazon Echo. I just received it a few days ago and I an having fun asking Alexa different questions and requesting to hear different songs. I almost feel that I am talking to a regular person across the room. I'm sure that in the near future that there will be more upgrades to improve the Echo's data and performance. The sound quality is awesome & I enjoy listening to news, weather, and sports updates. The Amazon Echo makes a great Christmas gift because it has so many features that you can use in your daily routine and I am sure that the Echo will be able to process even more information through performance updates.
customer_reviews.author: MadogSteve0323

customer_reviews.title: Good music player
customer_reviews.text: For $179 its disappointing as an information center, but good for music requests, as an alarm clock and for keeping track of appointments. It also works as a phone from your contact list, although it gets confused by more than one phone number listing. It also allows orders to be placed on Amazon. Most informational questions result in the same "Sorry, I'm not sure" or "Sorry, I don't know" reply. For that you still need to use the Google app on a phone or "Google Home" .
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bloch

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality & Alexia is an added bonus
customer_reviews.text: This Amazon Echo is fricken awesome. I was very surprised on how loud it can get and the sound quality is great. I haven't used Alexia very much yet but I do like having it when your hands are full and you need to ask her something. I've listened to music loud for more then 8 straight hours and it's been great. The bluetooth range is also very good. I can walk around the whole house with my iPhone in my pocket and never lose the signal. I have a 7.2 Dolby Atmos home theater receiver and I've been using this now more then that to listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: NINelson

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Echo just died after warranty expired again!!
customer_reviews.text: The other day my 2nd Echo died a few weeks after the warranty expired. This is twice now, very soon after warranty expiration. . Amazon won't repair or replace it. I just bought several new smart devices, too, that I enjoy using via Alexa, which now I no longer can. I really don't want to have to replace my echos (I have/had two of them) every year. That said, I guess I'll try the Google devices now. Very sad since I've been a devoted Amazon customer since the mid 90s. Not a way to garner repeat customers Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: C. GRECO

customer_reviews.title: Failed after warranty
customer_reviews.text: They don't make this version anymore but I'm very disappointed. This is our second echo as we already had an echo dot. Everything was fine for about a year and then the speaker just stopped working. You can talk to alexa and see it talking back with the lights flashing, but no sound comes out. We can unplug and plug it back and and it seems to work for about a day or two but then the sound shuts off again and there is no way to get it to work without unplugging it. Very frustrating that this happened right after the 1 year warranty expired. I won't by future stand alone echo products.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Entertainment Center!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It was easy to setup after downloading the required Alexa App, extremely user friendly. Great entertainment source with endless music from all eras and moods of music. Fun with trivia and a library of information that's beyond imagination. I haven't tried the remote functions i.e. turning on appliances, controlling home security and etc. My order from amazon arrived as scheduled. Packaging was very protective with an outer box along with air pads to prevent damage to the unit. I gave it four stars because battery is not included and must be purchased separately. Unit operates by plugging into a wall outlet. I would highly recommend this instrument for school aged children.
customer_reviews.author: URQT

customer_reviews.title: Still hoping for a big update
customer_reviews.text: It has good sound. It can play a lot of prime music. It can play some of my music that I purchased on Amazon, but no music that I didn't purchase on Amazon. For some reason, it often says that it can't find music that I did purchase on Amazon and want to listen to. It doesn't seem to have gotten any more intelligent over time. I'm really disappointed in the so-called skills that are continuously being added to the app. They are really more like 'sponsored' skills, and you have to use exact language to make them work. The bar for quality for those skills doesn't seem to be very high.
customer_reviews.author: Richmond Delorme

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product, room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I love the echo, it's a great product that is useful, productive, entertaining, and fun. For the price I was hoping for a little better quality sound at higher levels, but overall it's fairly good. It's somewhat of a work in progress as far as Alexa goes, can be glitchy and frustrating but it's improved in the few months I've owned it. I would love to see improvements in software especially having installed programs "at the ready" instaed of the extra step of "Alexa , open "program" and then "Alexa, "program request" . Overall a great addition to your home and life.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Known issues yet poor product quality and customer support
customer_reviews.text: Product was great until it stopped working right after the 1 year warranty was up. Now the echo randomly stops producing any sound. I can tell it it listening because my queries show up in the Alexa app history. It isn't connected to any other device, this is a legitimate firmware) software issue that has been confirmed by many other users in forums. I have to reboot it daily to get any use out of it. Usually Amazon has impeccable customer service but they didn't seem to care about this problem. Might be worth looking at the Google home option, perhaps their quality and customer commitment is better.
customer_reviews.author: Ten

customer_reviews.title: my life is complete and the Echo easily becomes one of the best gifts I've ever received
customer_reviews.text: Now that Alexa can link up to my Spoitfy premium account, my life is complete and the Echo easily becomes one of the best gifts I've ever received. So easy to use that my 2 year-old can turn on music, this product has changed the way we fill our days - with music and audio books, rather than TV shows. Given the wide range of features, sound quality and price point, the Echo makes a lot of sense for our family, and we highly recommend it for others!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure until I got it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Amazon Echo. From Music to sports updates to my audible books to the alarm. I deliberated for 3 months or more on whether I thought it would be worth the price. I got a black Friday deal, but would even buy it over again at full price. I love Alexa!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie509

customer_reviews.title: Used to love it. Now it works less than half the time.
customer_reviews.text: This device (two of them) will no longer stay connected. About 75% of the time when I say Alexa, I get a low-pitched ding and either ‘I can’t understand’, or ‘device lost connection’. The first ten times or so u went thru the reconnect process with Alexa app on phone. After that I started just unplug and replug with the same results. Alexa works for a while and then when I need it it’s busted again. I have an echo dot on same network and have not seen this behavior with it. Please someone find a fix.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend to repay her for dogsitting. She loves it ! I have 3 myself .... great fun. BTW don't believe those stories about Alexa "listing in". Just doesn't happen unless you say the wake word. It HAS happened by accident when someone has said something that sounds like the wake word, but Amazon's engineers are working to improve that. I have no fear, Noone would want to listen to my conversations anyways and the convenience and ability to control my home lights, fans, etc. is wonderful !!!
customer_reviews.author: schuh

customer_reviews.title: Gets on my nerves
customer_reviews.text: Seems like as time goes on, Alexa is getting hard of hearing. More disobedient. More sluggish. Seems like 50% the time she just doesn't pick up voice commands, 25% of the time hearing and executing commands and somehow failing them, and 25% of the time working as intended. Really weird since the first week we had our echo, it was almost too sensitive to voice and performed tasks very quickly. I get sick of repeating voice commands 3+ times and having her say "okay" and then nothing happens.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: "Alexa" is unique!
customer_reviews.text: We have had an interesting few months with "Alexa"!!!! I'm surprised many times with what she knows and sometimes surprised with what she DOES NOT know! We are learning how to "expand" her knowledge and are having fun learning. She DOES have an attitude! She likes me, but does not seem to care much for my husband! Hmmmmm! She frequently cops an attitude with him.........he thinks she is more AI than we expected!!!!!! She is easy to use and easy to program new things. I like that she can "learn" new things and broaden her capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine May

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON ECHO - BLACK
customer_reviews.text: YES!!! Amazon Echo actually surpassed my expectations. When I originally ordered my Amazon Echo, I was really quite skeptacle and didn't expect much out of it. I opened the package,plugged it in and set it up. Then I checked it out, I MUST SAY THAT I WAS ABSOLUTELY AMAZED WHEN I FOUND OUT ALL OF THE THINGS THAT IT IS CAPABLE OF DOING!!!. I WAS ALSO AMAZED THAT SUCH AN ADVANCED PRODUCT COULD BE SO EASY TO USE!!!. In my opinion Amazon has done an EXCELLENT JOB putting this product together!!!, As far as I am concerned, anyone who spends the money to buy this product WILL NOT BE SORRY!!!
customer_reviews.author: todddjreese

customer_reviews.title: Empty nesters' best friend
customer_reviews.text: I received my Amazon Echo for my birthday the end of April and I love, love, love it. Being empty nesters when we leave the lights on in the kitchen or livingroom we only have each other at with that 'really are you kidding me' look. On a good day we aren't already snuggled in watching a movie or ready for sleep. Now we have Echo to yell at...lol. As nice as all that is having an instant answer to how to spell something, turn on the music, to adjust the volume, etc... I think I can go as far as to say that Echo is my best friend. I just wish I could name it something else.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Never will buy a Amazon Refurbished Product Again
customer_reviews.text: Been a happy customer since 2005, never have I been this unhappy. I'm completely disappointed that this item stopped working after a few months - of course past my return period. I feel duped. Reading other reviews it appears that this is not an uncommon issue, where the Echo stopped producing audio yet seems to be otherwise responsive (lighting up when you call "alexa", etc). Of course this had to be what caused it to be refurbished in the first place. If you unplug it and replug it in, it works for a while, then hours later stops working. The worst part is I bought this for employees at my office and now 17 people thing its garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Provenzano

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: It's such a cool product. I really can't say much more than has already been said by other reviewers. It is like having an assistant integrated into your home. I use it for my Audible books, setting timers, news updates, Pandora Music (which sounds great), and fact checking things (eg What's the capital of Wisconsin?). At some point I will install smart devices in the house and hopefully use Alexa to control their functions.
customer_reviews.author: E. Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: I would have to say Alexa was my best purchase of 2016
customer_reviews.text: Amazon........Nobody beats Amazon's service. I don't look anywhere else for anything I need. Amazon.......... Please DON'T CHANGE I bought this item back in 2016, I would buy it again. It has been a complete enjoyment since the day I opened the box.When ever I need to ask a question I ask Alexa. She keeps me informed with the weather, current sports, what's on T.V, and much more. I even ask her cooking questions and I get great responses. The longer you have Alexa the smarter she gets. When I don't fell like watching T.V. I just ask Alexa to play my music from my Players list. Yes I would buy this Item again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my family that I just had to give to them early! They are thrilled! My son-in-law is the biggest user, and has researched all the different ways the family can benefit. My daughter wanted one in the bedroom to use an an alarm and reminder of her schedules for the day, checking the weather, traffic, etc. My teenaged grandkids love having their favorite music at their command, and the Christmas tree lights and other electronic devices are already hooked up to voice control! This was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia F. Grunwaldt

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy and Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: While my Echo Show has replaced this Echo for my prime location use, it has continued life and usage in my master bedroom. Along with a couple Echo Dots that I've got scattered around the house, these devices, while not necessary for life, are very handy and fun for immediate information on a great variety of topics from weather to news to general information. I'm often amazed at how current and convenient the available info is. This original Echo has much better sound quality than the Dots and is somewhat more versatile. I've been very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cantonusa

customer_reviews.title: Apparently Alexa has died.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Echo worked for quite a while but the other day, JUST STOPPED WORKING. No response to command, "Alexa Stop." She just keeps on going and going to the point that we just "turned the sucker off." Flash forward, next day.....same thing and so on and so on and so on. Just because mine happens to be a 1st generation, for what we paid for it, it just plainly and simply should work. This is inexcusable!! Would NEVER even consider getting another. A one year warranty for HOW MUCH THIS THING COST is unacceptable. Perhaps will look into a Google device but at this point may Alexa RIP.
customer_reviews.author: pittsborolady

customer_reviews.title: Good News!
customer_reviews.text: Good News !! Alexa can now access Spotify. You can link your Spotify account on the Alexa app. She still can't access my playlist on Spotify, she can play some songs on Spotify ,but Alexa keeps evolving so I am sure it will be soon she will be able to access my playlists. I am so proud of her. She continues to blossom. She gets me up in the morning , tells me about the weather and traffic and lulls me to sleep with a bedtime story from my Audible Book list. From morning till night time , Alexa is my my buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbi Dog

customer_reviews.title: Cool tech, when it works
customer_reviews.text: My Echo has will not connect to Wi-Fi and continues to complete set up and then return to set up. The Amazon customer service team was thorough and helpful, but I have spent three hours troubleshooting myself, and an hour and ten minutes with Amazon customer service and technical support. I will be patient to wait for resolution in two days, but not enjoying my Echo experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to people with children
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun. I just ordered some electric outlet boxes to go with this. We’ve had it for about 6 months now. My only complaint, my kids make me crazy with it haha. Poor Alexa is constantly telling jokes, telling the weather, singing to my children and having to constantly change the music channel or song. Ugh! I gave it 5 stars because better her than me answering a bazillion questions a day hahaha On a serious note, I do love it for all things adult too. I can’t wait to try it with the electrical outlets as well. Great purchase and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Julie L

customer_reviews.title: Love the white color.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great sound quality. Great color for living room. Great for setting up with lights and voice commands for house Great music player and pairs easy with phone Cons: -Alexa is still dumb as heck and makes Siri look like a genius. She is SUPER specific on voice prompts and how you word commands still. - hard to communicate with at higher volumes. -difficulty finding different versions of same song by same artist/differing artist unless you know exactly who sang it and the song name as it usually plays most known versions of music requests.
customer_reviews.author: Bshocks7377

customer_reviews.title: What great while it worked
customer_reviews.text: I guess 3 years was an ok run, though I have other electronics that have lasted a lot longer than that. I woke up this morning, or should say I didn't wake up this morning because my Echo finally decided to take a dirt nap. When I unplugged it and plugged it back in I got the spinning blue ring of death. The reset button does nothing. I guess this is just a sign that I need to try another manufacturer. I can say it won't be the one that starts with a G, stopped using anything from them years ago.
customer_reviews.author: ThemAintKosherRules

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and interactive step into the march to artificial intelligence
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and interactive step into the march to artificial intelligence. Surprisingly fast response to questions posed and a real office and home assistance too. It's definitely a needed accoutrement to every household and office environment. If I have a complaint it is simply in the low fidelity sound which makes music listening muddy. In all other respects the Alexa voice recognition is superb and the fact that "she" learns and keeps adding more and more information is quite remarkable. As a senior citizen, I find this device a necessary part of my daily routines and urge people considering a purchase to own Echo and at least some room extensions as well. Well Done Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amka Corp -. King

customer_reviews.title: When this amazing device is not managing our infrastructure
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th Echo we have. We have a large Victorian that we have completely automated. We have our Alexa's connected to our ADT system, Nest Zoned Thermostats, Philips Hue lights, and Cameras. We use them for ordering Prime Pantry items from any room in the house. Out of dog food, we ask Alexa to reorder. Getting low on a product, we just order by voice. When this amazing device is not managing our infrastructure, we have unlimited Amazon Music and we take advantage of it with our Alexa's. These devices have changed a 170 year old home into the home of the future. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I am slightly disappointed at its limitations
customer_reviews.text: I received the Amazon Echo while it was still in its beta version in November 2014. I waited until now to give it a proper review. After three years of use, I am slightly disappointed at its limitations. The device also hasn't held up as expected and I am finding it harder to communicate with Alexa. Sometimes I have to yell for it to turn off, while most times I have to repeat the command at least twice. This hasn't always been the case, which makes me think that it won't last 5 years. The best feature are the daily updates and weather features.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my son on Autism spectrum!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 22 and on the Autism Spectrum. He recently moved into his own place in same building as me. He was concerned about needing reminders, alarms and timers especially when cooking as he sometimes forgot to turn off the stove. I bought him the Amazon Echo to help with this! Now when he starts a task that he needs to return to he has Alexa set a timer to remind him! He also uses her to remind him to go to work etc. it’s given him some peace of mind and is helping him achieve his independence. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Pettie

customer_reviews.title: so much fun, great music clarity
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough positive things about the echo, so much fun, great music clarity. How did i survive without it alll my life of a mystery to me. amazon prime music best! You must get this! I just ordered the wireless stand to bring outside on deck, etc. Yay!! She makes me laugh and they are constantly adding things to her which is so AWESOME! Best investment for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this thing for so long. Does not play your own music anymore.
customer_reviews.text: No longer plays my personal music because of a policy change. Unless you buy it from Amazon you can't play it anymore. I have 4 echoes I have got over the last 3 year. In January they will be all but worthless. We have a custom playlist and songs for our kids from a CDs...... Can do that any more. All they care about is getting you to sign up for their music streaming service. Amazon called me after this review. If enough people complain they may change the policy, If not the products from Google will do what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Nater662

customer_reviews.title: Finally, My Smart Home Gets a Voice!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this thing especially the kids, She helps them with homework and even cool fun facts! I love the ability to finally be able to control SMartthings with my voice this was huge! Her skills get better and more well rounded everyday! This is one device that i know i have definitely gotten used multiple times a day every day!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Horn

customer_reviews.title: We like our Echo
customer_reviews.text: This was the first Echo product that I bought. It has been a fun gadget to have in the house that I primarily use to ask questions and play music. Starting to work on my smart house configuration and look forward to what it can do overall. The only thing that has frustrated me is that I seem to only be able to play music on this speaker and not on multiple echos when using Spotify. This has bummed me out a bit. Hopefully that will change in near future. This Echo does have good sound, in my opinion. Not quality of Sonos or Bose, but definitely good enough for my tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Jody D.

customer_reviews.title: Alexa Anchored in our house
customer_reviews.text: Instead of portability, we opted to have Alexa sit in a home area that was easy for spoken commands. We are extremely pleased with this asset and to top it off, our pets are being soothed by classical music when we are out and about. I can hear Gershwin to help wake me up along with my morning coffee and get busy with Joe Cocker later. American in Paris whenever I need to do a little daydreaming - finish the day with Rhapsody in Blue. Hear anything I want thanks to my own music and Amazon's vast library. Great device!
customer_reviews.author: Renshai

customer_reviews.title: Apparently the future is behind the times.
customer_reviews.text: What the...? The Echo can set an alarm, the Echo can play music on demand, but it can't wake you up with music? Also when I command it to wake me up in a half hour or so to take a nap, that's the timer alarm which you can't change. So I try "set an alarm for a half hour from now." STILL the same annoying timer alarm. Seriously guys, I feel like I bought a cruise ticket for a massive entertainment ship but can't leave my room. Who developed this thing? Tom Hanks from Castaway? I bought a $180 uncustomizable weather announcer, and I use free apps on my phone for everything else. Yay
customer_reviews.author: Jopom

customer_reviews.title: A amazing device !
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased my Amazon Echo when it first came out in 2014. It is one of the best purchases ever. It has amazing sound, picks up voice questions extremely well, or I can use it’s remote control from another room. Very easy to setup. Are use it every day to tell it to play a certain genre that I want/ask about the weather, or just about any other question do you have instead of looking it up on a computer. It’s a device I could not live without.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L

customer_reviews.title: Good, but can be better!
customer_reviews.text: Bought an #Amazon Echo through QVC, and I've had fun setting it up today. Today it's a novelty, but soon it will be an essential tool in the home. Not hard to set up. I'm a bit disappointed in the apps they call "skills" though. Most of them are useless crap, including many of the productivity skills. That should change in time as new skills come online. For example, they need a calendar skill that links with my iPad and iPhone calendar. The good thing about it is that the Echo updates constantly and gets smarter. It will make a good multipurpose tool in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory N. Cecil

customer_reviews.title: You'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. The voice of Alexa is very soothing (I love the way she says good night). She is very responsive to my commands and I don't have to shout for her to hear me. She plays the music I want and answers most of the questions I ask. At night, I ask her to play Ray Anthony, and turn off in 10 minutes. I can then ask her to wake me at a certain time in the morning. Unfortunately, I have one con: Music has begin to cut out intermittently for minutes at a time. It returns as if nothing had happened. II'm going to have to call support to ask for help.
customer_reviews.author: Musiclover

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: You seem to have to download a lot of apps to get the full use. I am sick of signing in with user names and passwords, and really don't have the desire to sign up and take up space on my mobile devices and manage more apps. So I find the Ecco disappointing compared to the advertisements.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, Alexa OK
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but bought it just a couple weeks before they released a new version and reduced the price. Your English has to be really good and well pronounced for Alexa to understand what you are saying. Works for native English speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Chelo

customer_reviews.title: To me the sound quality on the 1st Generation exceeds the new 2nd Gen's even with the new updates
customer_reviews.text: To me the sound quality on the 1st Generation exceeds the new 2nd Gen's even with the new updates. Bass for example is deeper/richer. When it comes to speakers size does matter for low's and mid-range and the 1st gen tweeter is nearly 3.5x larger than the 2nd gen!
customer_reviews.author: Rift Corbitt

product_meta.title: Amazon Echo - Black (1st Generation)
feature_bullets: Plays all your music from Amazon Music, Spotify, Pandora, iHeartRadio, TuneIn, and more using just your voice
Call or message anyone hands-free with your Echo device. Also, instantly connect to other Echo devices in your home using just your voice.
Fills the room with immersive, 360? omni-directional audio. Play music simultaneously across Echo devices with multi-room music (Spotify and Sirius XM support coming soon).
Hears you from across the room with far-field voice recognition, even while music is playing

Answers questions, reads the news, reports traffic and weather, reads audiobooks from Audible, gives info on local businesses, provides sports scores and schedules, controls Amazon Video on Fire TV, and more using the Alexa Voice Service
Controls lights, fans, TVs, switches, thermostats, garage doors, sprinklers, locks, and more with compatible connected devices from WeMo, Philips Hue, Sony, Samsung SmartThings, Nest, and others
Always getting smarter and adding new features, plus thousands of skills like Uber, Domino's, DISH, and more
